monogr.title: The Anaphoral Genesis of the Institution Narrative in Light of the Anaphora of Addai and Mari: Acts of the International Liturgy Congress, Rome 25-26 October 2011

body.bibl: Giraudo, Cesare. “L’anafora Di Addai e Mari: Banco Di Prova per La Sistematica Dell’Eucaristia.” In The Anaphoral Genesis of the Institution Narrative in Light of the Anaphora of Addai and Mari: Acts of the International Liturgy Congress, Rome 25-26 October 2011, edited by Cesare Giraudo, 209–34.
